about: I am a brand marketer, specialising in positioning,experience design and creative + commercial copy.

skills.title: What I don’t do.
contents: SEM or PPC… Basically anything too concerned with acronyms + algorithms.

skills.title: What I love to do.
contents: Make brands look, sound + feel sensational

solution.title: The ‘pick your brain’ solution
contents: Like a lot of creative professionals, I have found myself sharing a lot of thoughts, contacts and strategies over a lot of coffees.
Talking, caffeinating and being useful are three of my favourite activities, so it’s easy to see how this became a big part of my working week.
But for the benefit of your business (and mine too), these chats are now more defined, refined and retitled ‘consults’.

If your needs don’t neatly fit into the three offerings listed above - or, if you’re simply at the early stages of something new and exciting but not quite ready to implement - this might just be the professional sounding board you’re after.
Delivered in person or online, bring along your queries, your challenges, and your (work-related!) wish-list, and together we’ll sculpt your vision and next steps for action.

projects.title: Brands I’ve worked with or for…

comments.description: “Highly creative, conceptual and visionary, Hannah is a brilliant marketer with a natural flair for communication. One of the most delightful people on the planet, she possesses a rare ability to hold the room with people of all levels. Enthusiastic, adventurous, confident, intuitive, hard working, a team player and ambitious...the complete package.”
comments.writer: Rebecca Campbell, Creative Director + Best-selling Author
